page.title: 21Trade in Kyleakin
page.content:
Kyleakin has no shops as such, since Cameron's closed, though there is a small Store (mainly for Residents of the Hostel there) at Saucy Mary's Hostel. There is a Tourist Information Point at the Bright Water Centre. Since the Youth Hostel closed and was converted into affordable housing, there are now no facilities for visiting Yachts, ie: showers, launderette etc. The nearest Filling Stations are either in Kyle or Broadford. There is no longer a Garage in the Village.

There are two Hotels - Mackinnon Country House Hotel & The Kings Arms, a Coffee Shop and two Restaurants (one currently closed). There are a large number of Guest Houses and B&B's and three Backpacker Hostels. There are three Public Houses - the Haakon (closed), Saucy Mary's and The Kings Arms.
